service_desc: We provide emergency out-parent care service, observation inpatient care service, operation theater service, medical check-up service and Digital X Ray.
Our experience and qualified Pathologists and Microbiologists provide precise results 24 hours a day with the help of the laatest laboratory equipment and skilled Lab Technicians.
There is a large and spacious park for your leisure and relaxation. For your convenience during the hospital stay, our hospital has ASIA LIGHT convenience store and Feel VICTORIA Restaurant.
We provide ENT & Audiometry service, physiotherapy service, ultrasound service (2D, 4D, Color Doppler)

Whenever there are any emergency health problems in your family, we provide 24 hours ambulance service. This service includes a medical team made out of experienced doctors and nurses along with emergency medical equipment and supplies.
